statements: SELECT * FROM products_inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level, price FROM products_inventory WHERE stock_level < 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products_inventory WHERE contactless_payment = true;
SELECT product_name, last_updated FROM products_inventory ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, stock_level FROM products_inventory WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products_inventory WHERE contactless_payment = TRUE ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, last_updated FROM products_inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 AND contactless_payment = TRUE ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM products_inventory WHERE price > 100.00 AND stock_level > 0 ORDER BY stock_level DESC, product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Products ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, payment_amount FROM Products JOIN Payments ON Products.product_id = Payments.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE stock_level > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Products WHERE stock_level < 20 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM Products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT p.product_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM Products p JOIN Payments pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id GROUP BY p.product_name HAVING total_payment > 1000;
SELECT product_name, payment_amount FROM Products p JOIN Payments pm ON p.product_id = pm.product_id WHERE payment_amount > 50 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM Products WHERE stock_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE amount >= 1000.00 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT product_id, product_name, stock_level FROM Products WHERE stock_level < 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_level > 0;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM product_inventory WHERE price >= 100 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_inventory WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT users.full_name, product_inventory.product_name, stock_level FROM users JOIN product_inventory ON users.user_id = product_inventory.product_id;
SELECT payment_transactions.transaction_id, payment_transactions.amount, users.email FROM payment_transactions JOIN users ON payment_transactions.product_id = users.user_id;

SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_changed) AS total_quantity_changed FROM product_inventory JOIN stock_history ON product_inventory.product_id = stock_history.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity_changed DESC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_date, Products.product_name FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.order_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT customer_name, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id JOIN Payments ON Orders.order_id = Payments.order_id GROUP BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 OR price > 500 ORDER BY stock_quantity ASC, price DESC;
